subject: Hello all!
body:
Hi all,
Does anyone know if the CVS snapshots on the freesoft.org site are current? 
For example, the link where it says "Latest CVS snapshot" for either 
Speech-Dispatcher, or SpeechD-up?
If not, could someone please point me to where the very latest CVS tarballs 
can be downloaded? Thanks.
Regards,

--Keith.


_______________________________________________
Speakup mailing list
Speakup@braille.uwo.ca
http://speech.braille.uwo.ca/mailman/listinfo/speakup
